commentText: The 5 most effective household weapons against walkers - spoiler: your kitchen is better armed than you think.
Urban camouflage techniques: How to move through cities without attracting hordes. Light refraction matters more than scent!
Bunker ventilation hacks: Keep your air fresh without revealing your location. The coffee filter trick saves lives.
Walker decomposition timeline: Why months 3-6 are actually the most dangerous. Our research proves it.
Nomad's guide to highway navigation: Which road signs predict safe routes and which scream 'ambush ahead'.
The 3-second rule is dead. New findings show infection spreads instantly through open wounds. Throw out your old first aid kits.
Rainwater collection systems that filter walker contaminants. The tarp-and-charcoal method has 97% efficacy.
Sound frequency experiments: We tested which noises attract walkers from farthest distances. Never hum this tune again.
Scavenging psychology: Why the middle shelves in abandoned stores hold the most untouched supplies.
Moonless night travel protocols: How we covered 18 miles undetected using only starlight navigation.
